description: Grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into snow at will, turning the user into a Snow Human. As a Logia type, the user can become intangible snow and reform their body.

users.circumstances: Monet reveals her snow powers for the first time when protecting Caesar from Luffy's attacks

abilityReveals.description: User creates a protective snow wall or dome structure to shield themselves or others.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Monet uses Kamakura to create a snow barrier protecting Caesar from Luffy's attacks.

abilityReveals.description: As a Logia user, Monet can transform her body into snow, becoming intangible.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Monet demonstrates her Logia intangibility when intervening in the battle.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and powerlessness in seawater
Heat-based attacks can melt the snow

strengths.strength: Logia intangibility - can avoid physical attacks by becoming snow
strengths.description: As a Logia type, Monet can let attacks pass through her snow body.
Snow manipulation allows for defensive and offensive capabilities.

description: Grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into various types of gas at will, turning the user into a Gas Human. The user can manipulate poisonous gases, flammable gases, and even remove oxygen from an area.

users.circumstances: Caesar uses his gas manipulation abilities in combat against Luffy

abilityReveals.description: User removes oxygen from a designated area to suffocate opponents.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar attempts to kill Luffy by draining all oxygen from the room.

abilityReveals.description: User concentrates oxygen on a bladeless lighter weapon to create a super-heated blue flame sword that can slice and burn simultaneously.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar creates a flame sword made of concentrated oxygen to attack Luffy.

abilityReveals.description: User concentrates flammable gas in an area and ignites it with matches to create a massive fireball explosion.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar uses combustible gas to create large-scale fire attacks against Luffy.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and powerlessness in seawater
Vulnerable to Haki-infused attacks despite Logia intangibility

strengths.strength: Logia intangibility - can avoid physical attacks by becoming gas
strengths.description: As a Logia type, Caesar can let attacks pass through his gaseous body.

strengths.strength: Versatile gas manipulation for offense and defense
strengths.description: Can create poisonous gases, remove oxygen, create explosions, and form weapons.

strengths.strength: Scientific knowledge enhances Devil Fruit creativity
strengths.description: Caesar's scientific expertise allows him to use his powers in innovative and deadly ways.
